text: It's amazing how people will give when you don't ask. Many of them send money because they believe in the message.
author: Joel Osteen

text: Money and corruption are ruining the land, crooked politicians betray the working man, pocketing the profits and treating us like sheep, and we're tired of hearing promises that we know they'll never keep.
author: Ray Davies

text: One does not need buildings, money, power, or status to practice the Art of Peace. Heaven is right where you are standing, and that is the place to train.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

text: The price we have to pay for money is sometimes liberty.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: We can be thankful to a friend for a few acres, or a little money and yet for the freedom and command of the whole earth, and for the great benefits of our being, our life, health, and reason, we look upon ourselves as under no obligation.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
